Name: Battery
Description: An electrical battery is used to store electrical charge for later use.  This type should be used for specific batteries using a specific cell technology. e.g. the iPod Nano battery or a Duracell AA battery.

Properties.Name: Capacity
Properties.Description: The maximum charge of this battery.

Properties.Name: Cell type
Properties.Description: The cell type of this battery

Properties.Name: Chemistry
Properties.Description: The chemicals used in this battery

Properties.Name: Energy
Properties.Description: The maximum energy stored in this battery

Properties.Name: Number of cells
Properties.Description: The number of cells used in this battery

Properties.Name: Size
Properties.Description: The size of the battery if an internationally recognized size (if applicable)

Properties.Name: Voltage
Properties.Description: The electrical potential difference of this battery (in Volts)
